pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, August 21, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Nanaimo, British Columbia 

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of British Columbia, John Horgan.

Vancouver Island Conference Centre

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media should present themselves at 80 Commercial Street no later than 4:00 p.m.

7:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Cabinet Retreat family photo.

Vancouver Island Conference Centre

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity for Cabinet Retreat accredited media only. If you have not obtained Cabinet Retreat accreditation in advance, please email media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca.  
    • Accredited media should arrive no later than 7:20 p.m.
